title: Catalytic activity of Cu–cysteine coated on Ti3C2MXene toward peroxymonosulfate activation for carbamazepine degradation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,4174-4185
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00342J, Paper
Pascaline Sanga, Haitham Saad Al-mashriqi, Jing Xiao, Jia Chen, Hongdeng Qiu
Cu–cy/Ti3C2MXene demonstrated outstanding catalytic performance in activating peroxymonosulfate, leading to the production of reactive oxygen species that decomposed up to 98.6% of carbamazepine.
